ygData.subject: Re: Sorri
ygData.msgSnippet: Garren, I m ok.  Dun take it seriously.  I was just tired of Magician.  Without the pets, he is only 1/2 wiz without the rooting ability.  That sux.  Most high
ygData.messageBody:
Garren,

I'm ok. Dun take it seriously. I was just tired of Magician. Without the pets, he is only
1/2 wiz without the rooting ability. That sux. Most high lvl hunting place are dungeon
that pets pose a high risk. Maybe time to switch to my shaman. Sigh.

On Tue, 28 Sep 1999 09:04:20 +0800, Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:

>From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
>FF,
> Sorri about last nite at Lower Guk. It wasn't ur fault. It my fault.
>Ur lvl is just 1 lvl lower to get out of the Ice Bones aggr range. I should
>have get the group to clear it instead of blaming you. Please accept my
>apologies.
>
>>Singapore Everquest Players List
>
>


Best Regards,

Tommy Fong
